name: Station of Secrets
description:
Station of Secrets takes place in a future time where the humanity have spread all across the universe

Our main character is a space pirate who travels around the universe to explore abandoned stations and tries to find valuable data that he can sell and earn great amounts of money.

"E" to interact with objects

"F" to open flashlight

"Shift" to run faster

"A"  and "D" to move and "Space" to jump 

This was our group project for finals at the university.
